text: Auberive is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Haute-Marne department in northeast France. ==Images== Image:Auberive Church.jpg|Church Image:Auberive Chateau.jpg|Chateau Auberive Image:Gate to the Chateau.jpg|Gate to the Chateau Image:Photo stream - Auberive, Haute-Marne (52).jpg|River Aube ==Population== ==Related pages== *Communes of the Haute-Marne department ==References== Category:Communes in Haute-Marne
title: Auberive
